pr_title: Added support to list paths on a directory

timeline.message: Added support to list paths on a directory

timeline.bodyText: Should move this try/catch deeper into the call stack, either the public overload or in the package-private method so that we don't need to put it in multiple locations.

timeline.bodyText: I think we want a separate snippet for the directory, no?
